TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: 포커스 변경 이벤트에 대한 데이터를 제공합니다.

span.span: Provides data for a focus-changed event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 idObject, int32 idChild) cil managed
Public Sub New (idObject As Integer, idChild As Integer)

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.
The child ID of the object that received focus.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `idObject` 및 `idChild` 매개 변수에 포함 되어는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] UI 자동화 클라이언트가 연결 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 식별자 개체를 에 `IAccessible` 이전 액세스 가능한 기술 응용 프로그램에서 개체.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChildId As Integer
public: property int ChildId { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 포커스를 받는 개체의 자식 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] 식별자를 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 개체 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] 애플리케이션 내에서 액세스 가능 개체의 범주를 식별 하는 32 비트 값입니다.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. `idObject` 및 `idChild` 개체를 포함 하는 매개 변수 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] client 연결 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 에 `IAccessible` 이전 액세스 가능한 기술 응용 프로그램에서 개체입니다.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ObjectId As Integer
public: property int ObjectId { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.
The ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus.

value.span: 가능한 값을 참조 하세요 [개체 식별자](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) Microsoft Active Accessibility 설명서에서.

span.span: For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 개체 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] 애플리케이션 내에서 액세스 가능 개체의 범주를 식별 하는 32 비트 값입니다.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. `idObject` 및 `idChild` 개체를 포함 하는 매개 변수 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] client 연결 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 에 `IAccessible` 이전 액세스 가능한 기술 응용 프로그램에서 개체입니다.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
